name: Treva Horme
Lore: 'Lutrillian. Primary saleswoman and executive planner for Planet Dreams, Inc. Monitors production schedules and accounting. Really enjoys making a sales pitch.',
Text: 'During your control phase, may ''sell'' one Interrupt card from hand. Opponent must use X Force, where X = destiny of that card or entire Force Pile (opponent''s choice). Place sold card on opponent''s Used Pile and activate X Force.',
